Uses of Class
alston.minecraft.InventoryBar

    • Uses of InventoryBar in alston.minecraft

      Methods in alston.minecraft that return InventoryBar 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InventoryBar Game.getInventoryBar() 
      Constructors in alston.minecraft with parameters of type InventoryBar 
      Constructor and Description
      Inventory(InventoryBar bar)
      Constructs a new Inventory by initializaing the array of Items (however, NOT each individual Item; setup() should be called to do this for efficiency and readibility purposes), and all the Nodes associated with the Inventory.
      Player(InventoryBar bar)
      Creates a new Player by initiating the Inventory, and control, then adding it to the physics.
